relation: In the heart of everett so pretty close by everything.
I did not live on campus.
Good class range. Well organized. Nice campus.

textAfterTable: The teachers really know what they're teaching. They understand the material and are able to relay the information to the students very effectively. The teachers are here to help, they won't turn anyone away, which is comforting. The curriculum is at a good level. It pushes you to work hard and to study hard, but it is also graspable. Login to rate or flag the reviews Chelsea from Arlington, WA 01/03/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 2 of 49 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Older adults, Nursing majors, Environmentalists, TOMs wearers Tips for prospective students Sign up for classes the MINUTE you can. They fill up quickly, especially the English & Math classes. Bang for the buck It's worth it. Am enjoying being here The
